mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_BS_TBL (ord_code, mem_id, ord_name, ord_postcode, ord_addr_basic, ord_addr_detail, ord_tel, ord_price, ord_regdate, ord_status, payment_status) VALUES ( #{ord_code}, #{mem_id}, #{ord_name}, #{ord_postcode}, #{ord_addr_basic}, #{ord_addr_detail}, #{ord_tel}, #{ord_price}, sysdate, #{ord_status}, #{payment_status} )

INSERT INTO ORDER_DT_TBL(ord_code, prd_num, dt_amount, dt_price) SELECT #{ord_code}, c.prd_num, c.cart_amount, p.prd_price FROM CART_TBL C INNER JOIN PRODUCT_TBL P ON C.PRD_NUM = P.PRD_NUM WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id}
